rules:
    has-x-api-id:
            :
            :
        message: API must have an unique identifier in x-api-id in #/info/x-api-id.
        description: The `#/info/x-api-id` field can be used to associate an identifier to an API. This is useful to track an API even when its `#/info/title` changes.
        given: $
        severity: error
        recommended: true
        type: style
            field: info.x-api-id
            function: truthy
